resources.string: Christopher Columbus sailed the ocean blue in 1492.
George Washington was the first American president.
The Haymarket Affair resulted in the hanging of four convicted anarchists.
Wage reductions were commonplace during economic downturns.
The West was a remarkably homogeneous regionâ€”only in the twentieth century would it become ethnically diverse.
Cleopatra was the first egyptian women to become pharaoh.
The UN has never taken a stand on the issue of human rights.
A Republican majority in Congress was maintained when Grant was elected president.
